A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Really terrible.  Worst starwars movie except possibly episode 2. Seriously\, it is that bad.  Don't waste your money. \nPlot holes for days. Nothing Finn does makes a damn bit of difference and princess lea flies through space in the worst CG of the film.  \nAbsolutely terrible.
